divs: sighting detailsevery morning at 4am (for years), i sit in my recliner chair, facing south, and looking west up at the stars. i sit next to my swimming pool drinking hot tea....as i was looking up, out of no-where a bright non-flashing light appeared (a very clear night) moving very slow. it was traveling in a south-east direction, then south (it was following the roof-line of my home that faces due-south, then it headed due-south and disappeared because of my roof line. the total time (viewing) was about 30 seconds, traveled a an "z" configuration.................question, i see very often, what i believe are satellites...is there a map\grid or something that i see if i'm seeing satellites, if so please email to me.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Yuma
There were no other sightings in Yuma on or around August 6th 2013
Summary: Appeared out of no-where,traveled in a figure "S"
